about_the_game: Get a fresh take on the futuristic top-down mech shooter with an all-new character: Yoko Takano. Born to protect and serve, Yoko is ready to become the spearhead of a revolution in private military services, simultaneously creating profits for investors and experimenting with new combat concepts. Put her to the test in-game and find new ways to wreak havoc on robot-kind!
detailed_description: Get a fresh take on the futuristic top-down mech shooter with an all-new character: Yoko Takano. Born to protect and serve, Yoko is ready to become the spearhead of a revolution in private military services, simultaneously creating profits for investors and experimenting with new combat concepts. Put her to the test in-game and find new ways to wreak havoc on robot-kind!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz or equal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Core i7 or equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 770 or equal
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan)
  • Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz or equal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad

Recommended:

name: Hybrid Wars - Yoko Takano

Minimum:

  • Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz or equal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770

short_description: Up your game with a whole new character, a high-level specialist in tech-espionage and corporate security: Yoko Takano. Take on wave after wave of enemy forces using her unique skills and arsenal.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
